comments_since_last_sample.body:
VG Tech made a true better analysis than this fiasco.
you saved the resolution to not harm PS5? maybe.

These consoles are dissapointinly  beginning to show thier limits already. No ray tracing for 60fps or ray tracing at 30fps? Seriously? From what I have seen this is the case with most of the recent ray traced games on ps5 and xbsx. Why are we still settling for 30fps in 2021?
